articles.description: Here’s a new look at Devolver Digital’s Ape Out, an indie game from Gabe Cuzzillo that mashes Hotline Miami action with a Saul Bass aesthetic. The game will be released Feb. 7, 2019, on Nintendo Switch and Windows PC.
